title: Raven: Mining Defensive Patterns in Ethereum via Semantic Transaction Revert Invariants Categories
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: We frame Ethereum transactions reverted by invariants-require(<invariant>)/ assert(<invariant>)/if (<invariant>) revert statements in the contract implementation-as a positive signal of active on-chain defenses. Despite their value, the defensive patterns in these transactions remain undiscovered an
